column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place is super good. I would definitely come back for pastries and the food. The coffee and juice were delicious and I was impressed with the mimosa. They really take their time perfecting the pastries and desserts. Intricate detail on the decor. The place is kinda loud
column2: but it's quick and consistently good. I go here on Sundays a lot because the service is pretty fast. Definitely worth a trip. I always get pastries to go.
